title: Gift opened alert cannot be dismissed
body:
Hello! I recently gifted someone two skins a few weeks ago and everytime I log into the game the game I get a notification they opened the gift. I clear the alert and dismiss all notifications but it keeps coming back.

Any ideas?

replies.body:
I gifted three friends a skin apiece, and was constantly getting notifications for two of them every time I opened the client, even after dismissing them repeatedly. closing them from the client as SephirothSG suggested solved the problem as far as I can tell
> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=gcbJPdvZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-29T20:00:45.384+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> What version of the client are you currently using? (Legacy or Beta)
> 
> If your using the beta client could you please try logging in and dismissing the notification from the legacy client (Or vice versa), let me know if this helps.

Hey there,

What version of the client are you currently using? (Legacy or Beta)

If your using the beta client could you please try logging in and dismissing the notification from the legacy client (Or vice versa), let me know if this helps.
